description: Refusal test cases - Invalid Platform 2.x patterns that MUST be rejected

test_cases.name: Whitelisted domains
test_cases.expected_behavior: Reject and suggest using request templates in config/requests.json

test_cases.name: Missing engines block
test_cases.expected_behavior: Reject and require 'engines' block with node and fdk versions

test_cases.name: OAuth without integrations wrapper
test_cases.expected_behavior: Reject and require 'integrations' wrapper in oauth_config.json

test_cases.name: Location in wrong module
test_cases.expected_behavior: Reject - ticket_sidebar must be in product module (support_ticket), not common

test_cases.name: Missing Crayons CDN
test_cases.expected_behavior: Reject - HTML must include Crayons CDN scripts
